We’ll hear from Paul Sperry, former Hoover Institution media fellow and author of Infiltration: How Muslim Spies and Subversives Have Penetrated Washington, who detailed these allegations in a viral New York Post article titled “How U.S. covered up Saudi role in 9/11.”

We’ll also hear from Dr. Sebastian Gorka, Breitbart News National Security Editor and author of Defeating Jihad: The Winnable War, and Frank Gaffney, president of the Center for Security Policy and foreign policy adviser to Ted Cruz.

On the Monday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM EST, host and Breitbart News executive chairman Stephen K. Bannon will discuss the explosive new revelations about Saudi Arabia’s alleged role in 9/11 and reports of the alleged cover-up at the highest levels of our government.

Breitbart’s Rome correspondent Tom Williams will discuss Pope Francis’ trip to Greece and his comments that “we are all migrants.”
